snippet: BUSH--George, 87, died on Monday, January 4, 2016. Loving husband of the late Flora Wilhelm Bush. Devoted father of Dr. Rachel W. Bush and the late Dr. Jared Bush. Beloved grandfather to Maxwell, Zachary and Jacob. Adored youngest son of the late Benjamin and Rachel, and brother to the late Daniel and Paul. Also survived by his nephew and niece, Avigail and Jennifer. Services today, Wednesday, 10:30am, at Riverside Cemetery, Saddlebrook, NJ. May God comfort and sustain the family among the mourners of Zion. 1/3
